crop_disease_detection.title: Crop Disease Detection
crop_disease_detection.description: Upload an image of your crop to detect diseases and get treatment recommendations.

tips.heading: Tips for better results:
tips.tip1: Ensure good lighting when taking photos.
tips.tip2: Focus on the affected area of the plant.
tips.tip3: Include both healthy and diseased parts for comparison.
tips.tip4: Take multiple photos from different angles.
